description.short: When it comes to heavy duty trucks, RAM has led the way with massive powerplants and extremely capable suspensions.
description.long:
When it comes to heavy duty trucks, RAM has led the way with massive powerplants and extremely capable suspensions.

Starting with these fantastic platforms, THOR can help you build a truck to do everything well using parts from industry leaders like Carli Suspension and AEV Conversion.

There isn't much you can't do with a RAM 2500 truck.
